ygData.subject: Final Farewell! Someone else leaves the RPG...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Ah, OOC, I m as formal as ever. Well? Surprised by the title? Well, I guess that it had to come to this eventually. I know I ve said I ll be with this

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: Ah, OOC, I'm as formal as ever. Well? Surprised by the title? Well, I =
guess that it had to come to this eventually. I know I've said "I'll be wit=
h this RPG through thick and thin!" but then I thought about it and realize=
d what I had said and wondered...Why? Why should I stay in an RPG that I ju=
st do not find as fun as I used to. Why should I stay in an RPG when I'm no=
t even interested in Transformer's anymore, unless their G1. And why should=
 I stay with an RPG like NBW when I have as much fun as I do in my own RPG,=
 http://www.dbzsf.vze.com <Shameless self promotion. I know nobody will mis=
s me, probably, because nobody ever really liked my posts. So, like Alloran=
, and Zardus, and Jer, and Lurker, and many other greats before me, I'm ret=
iring. Sorry it had to come to this. Let's see here, what should I say in m=
y speech? Well, here it comes.

First of all, thank you Alloran. You were w=
hat kept me in NBW over the times, and all, and you were always fair to me =
and even became my friend when I yelled out a horrible "SCREW YOU!" Which w=
as just wrong of me, it really was. Alloran, I treasured the times we used =
to make fun of Liono and the things we used to say about JP! Oh, man! I had=
 fun, true fun.

Lurker, you are one of my greatest friends, too. At first =
I didn't understand you, but then I realized that we were so much alike tha=
t we were meant to be friends. It's a twist of fate.

Jer, you da man! Ther=
e, in your own words, even, Jer. You sure did make me feel bad for not talk=
ing to you in a while when you put me at the top of your mail. Well, you ar=
e one of the ELITE man. Seriously. It's great to be your friend. JUME!!!!

=
Jeff, you were one of the greatest moderators this RPG has ever seen. Your =
brand of fairness and punishment is unrivaled by any of the voted on Modera=
tors. You were also a good friend, and I also had fun talking with you.

Ro=
boRick, you are similar to me in several ways. Except your RPGing skills we=
re never as crappy as mine started out as. HAW! But really, it's fun talkin=
g to you and if you win your bid for Council Member, well, congratulations,=
 you deserve it. You are a good RPGer, and I hope that you have fun while I=
'm gone.

Zardus, you, I've had a very unusual relationship with. I first r=
eally met you when you called me an idiot for having Sinesis sweep up  your=
 guy, who was it? I can't remember now, but the point is, that we soon beca=
me friends. If it was not for Zardus, I would never be the RPGer I am today=
, he showed me the way to do things, and I'll never go back to the ALL CAPS=
 NO SPACES NO PARAGRAPHS NO SENSE guy I was before. I mean, I could only th=
ink about myself until I received the ultimate tutor in Zardus. Besides tha=
t, Zardus was always fair to me, helping me out when I had problems with ot=
her RPGers.

Cyberwolf, Airly, you 2 are cool with me. Cyberwolf takes the =
RPG very seriously, and is a great RPGer. Airly, you've been great, a good =
friend. I'm sure the 2 of you can keep NBW alive in the future.

Logo: I do=
n't really know what to say, besides that you were a great friend. I'm sorr=
y I never got one of my characters in a relationship with one of yours. Tru=
ly.

Finally, Minime_316. Thanks. RIP my friend.

Well, I guess that's it. =
Anyone who wishes to keep in contact with me can e-mail me at my god awful =
e-mail address, thecode@... Now, for a list! A list of every charac=
ter I've ever had in this RPG! It's going to be beautiful! Here it comes! (=
Make sure to read on past it, too)


Deemos
Sharpedge
Banzai-Tron
Godfather=

Torca
Holocaust
Artist
Diskus
Burning Hammer
Stranato
Stronghold
Blender
K=
lant
Shokaract
Gotron
ThunderCracker
Like-Like
Airbomber
Train Wreck
Doom I=
ce
Rizopas
Stalker
Arrow
Blot
Justice
Testifier
Sinesis
Sinister
Dracona
Gr=
anite
Cave-In
Beholder
Gangon
Etchingar
Serge
Clash
Gramps
Inzola
Divitri
T=
arantopulous
Grenade
Beholder 2
Gigas
Horn Drill
Kracken
Technosis
Pinsir
T=
he Hero
Instrat
Squawktalk
Sarge
Zeni
Perplex
Plintissa
Psuedo
Atma
Time Wa=
rp
Suukie

And finally, I end things by saying. Good luck, keep this RPG go=
ing, I know you can do it.

WHAT?

WHAT?

WHAT?

WHAT?

WHAT?

BOO YAA!

JU=
ME!

WOOD!

WHAT?

THE END! Seriously. I love you all! GOODBYE!...

Roland =
the Last Gunslinger, Blaine the Mono, Heap of Broken Images, Soulstice, Sou=
lstice Omega, Key and Rose, Tick Tock Man, Fear in a Handful of Dust, SCREA=
M, Vincent Price

Don't trouble trouble, until trouble troubles you!
(Get G=
ame Informer magazine)

REAL The End!

PS: Remember me!

PSSSSSSS: WOOOOO!
=

Bye.......................................................................=
........
